ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Provides access to an ordered list of response interceptors. Lists are expected to be built upfront and used read-only afterwards for @B_org#apache#http#protocol#HttpProcessor_E@.
